mapper.sql: SELECT tci.*, tcci.*, CONCAT(tcu.FIRST_NAME, ' ', tcu.LAST_NAME) as OWNER_NAME, tcu.ID as OWNER_ID, tcu.AVATAR_URL as AVATAR_URL FROM TOBE_CONTENT_INFO tci JOIN ${tableName} tcci ON tcci.CONTENT_ID = tci.ID AND tci.DELETED = 0 JOIN TOBE_CORE_USER tcu ON tci.OWNER_ID = tcu.ID AND tci.DELETED = 0
